New docs:

Title: Rename 608/708 Captions in the Player
Description: This topic explains how to rename captions tracks for HLS in the player to conform with 608 and 708 naming requirements.
Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/rename-608-708-captions.html
Category: Player Configuration, Accessibility, Player Management API
Status: Released
Type: New Doc


Title: Installing the Connector for Teams
Description: This topic covers the installation and configuration of the Brightcove Video Connector for Microsoft Teams.
Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/teams/installation.html
Category: Video Cloud Integrations
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Using the Connector for Microsoft Teams
Description: This topic covers using the Brightcove Connector for Microsoft Teams.
Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/teams/using.html
Category: Video Cloud Integrations
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Major updates:

Title: Managing Playlists Using the CMS API
Description: Updated for renaming 608/708 captions
Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/player-management/references/reference.html#operation/GetPlayerConfiguration
Category: Player Configuration, Accessibility, Player Management API
Status: Released
Type: Major Update

Title: Managing Playlists Using the CMS API
Description: Updated base URL to https://edge.api.brightcove.com/playback/v1 (now redirects all requests to the v2 version, except for customers still using v1)
Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/playback/references/reference_v2.html
Category: Playback API
Status: Released
Type: Major Update

Title: Getting Notifications When Videos Are Finished
Description: Added PHP code for simple app to handle notifications
Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/general-information/getting-notifications-when-videos-are-finished.html
Category: Zencoder
Status: Released
Type: Major Update


Minor updates:

Title: Known Issues: Studio and Brightcove Player
Description: Known Live issue: Recurring events still published when inactive show 3 segments of playback
Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/support/known-issues-studio-brightcove-player-and-apis.html
Category: Brightcove Live
Status: Released
Type: Minor Update

Title: Codecs and Formats
Description: Updated to mention newer video codecs that are supported
